root.name: Blade Kitten
root.description: OverviewBlade Kitten is an action-adventure game where you play as Kit Ballard, a half-cat half-human bounty hunter in 19 levels of side scrolling action. The game's story is a prequel to the comic from which the game is inspired in the world of Hollow Wish. You can buy Kit new costumes and you get to play 3 levels with Noot.Blade Kitten was set to be a two-part episodic game, with the original release being the first episode. Sadly, however, the game did not sell well enough to warrant a second game.
